name: Psychic Surge
description: The Pokemon can surround itself with a psychic field that makes everyone pause, hearing things that are not there.
effect: At the start of the Round the User may set Psychic Terrain (as the move). This effect may be used once per scene and lasts 4 Rounds. This ability's usage recharges after the User has used their action for the Round to perform an Alternative Action (Dodge, Struggle, etc).
